item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Powerful Way to
Experience WordPress

A wide range of services for enterprises, startups and ventures.

Download
Learn More
About Us

We Deliver Bespoke Software

We provide design and software digital services that are fully-flexible and powerful. Order dedicated software for general IT, CRM systems, web application development and more.

Advantages

Professional Services

Business Apps

We develop and deliver cost-effective business applications and operational software

Data Migration

We'll create a safe information environment for data migration based on your current system

CRM Systems

Improve your customer engagement with a bespoke, secure and dedicated CRM system

Startup Software

We help startups and ventures with the most challenging tech aspect of starting a project

White Label

We can help you build white label software solutions that you can license to your own clients

Consultancy

Our software consultants help define technology barriers to improve business tech aspects

Discover More

Frequently Asked Questions

Still have questions? Learn more about our services and experience through the questions of people like you.

can i get free expert advice?
If you already have the concept and design, you can request our free expert consultation and we'll get back to you within one week. If you need tech advice, you can book a premium one-hour consultation.
do i own the app?
We take care of your ownership rights! You have the right to the app we develop for your business needs. You also own the bespoke design solutions we create according to your mockups and instructions.
do you restore broken software?
We normally provide this service of restoring broken source code repositories. However, since this is the most time-consuming and challenging process, we need to firstly look through your particular problem.

What People Say About Us

You Are in Good Hands

I'm happy with the result! We managed to run a startup app for connecting businesses with medical experts in order to streamline their communication.

Adam Smith Founder, BizzPro

Modern IT skills, the best-in-class designers and overall great people to deal with! We recommend it to every startup. We look up to these experts!

Tom TaylorUnicorn
View all
Case Studies & News

Latest News from Our Blog

Get in Touch

Have a Question?

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our Approach

Mission & Vision

Our mission is to help startups and enterprises accelerate adoption of new web technologies. We build consumer-oriented apps as well as enterprise-grade business solutions.

Leverage our expertise in startup and enterprise software development, design solutions and API integration to improve the future of your business processes.

company CEO
Get Inspired

Our Best Projects

Meet the Team

Our Talented Minds

Jane RichardsonProject manager

A chief technology officer and a member of the board of directors

Michael CooperArt director

A creative mind behind all design projects and a creative manager

Marie TurnerTechnical architect

An energetic software developer and the logic mind behind the code

item.title: Typography
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
That last is no more than a foot high, and about seven paces across, a mere flat top of a grey rock which smokes like a hot cinder after a shower, and where no man would care to venture a naked sole before sunset. On the Little Isabel an old ragged palm, with a thick bulging trunk rough with spines, a very witch amongst palm trees, rustles a dismal bunch of dead leaves above the coarse sand.

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men. who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire.

Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure.

item.title: Banner WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Banner WordPress Blockallows you to build awesome promo banners, portfolio pages or put hot offers in the spotlight. The block comes with customizable sizing, alignments, colors, animation effects and more tools to help you get creative.

How User Experience Helps
Create an Interface

I will give you a complete account

Video Banner

Design perfect Video Banners for stores, blogs and posts in clicks

Block Animation

Design perfect banners for stores, blogs and posts in clicks

Text Animation

Design perfect banners for stores, blogs and posts in clicks

Start your business analyst career

When you need your company to have a new website or if you venture on updating your old webpage with a new look and functionality, the choices are versatile.

item.title: Section WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Section WordPress Blockfor Gutenberg Library is a multi-block container with deeply customizable layout and style settings (animation, background, typography and more). This is one of the ultimate addons for Gutenberg that can help you organize content in multiple creative ways.

Fixed background image, gradient background overlay with blend mode

We Deliver Bespoke Software

We provide design and software digital services that are fully-flexible and powerful. Order dedicated software for general IT, CRM systems, web application development and more.

Learn More

Background and foreground image, minimum height 100vh, shape dividers applied

Content vertical alignment - bottom, entrance animation

Scale Your Growth

Deliver Bespoke Software

item.title: Google Maps WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Google Maps WordPress Block is one of those Google Map addons that can be implemented without extra dependencies, allowing you to add multiple custom location markers and add maps in different styles.

Default style, opened by default marker tooltip

  • #1
  • #2

"Ultra light" style, disabled all map controls

  • #1
  • #2
  • #3
  • #4
  • #5

"Retro" style, disabled map zoom and street view controls

  • #1
  • #2

item.title: Advanced Heading WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Advanced Heading WordPress Blockmakes it easy to bring a truly custom typography to your WordPress theme. It gives access to Google fonts, styling, sizing, font weight, one-click text case conversion, letter spacing, colors and more tools to make your headings stand out.

choose a font style
you can choose any font-weight
You Can Choose any Google Font
Any style and color of this font

item.title: Button Group WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Button Group WordPress Blockadds a call-to-action marketing button in style and harmony with your theme. You'll be able to update the width, alignment, and direction for the whole set of buttons.

Default

Button 1
Button 2
Button 3

Horizontal direction and width 33%

Button 1
Button 2
Button 3

Vertical direction and width 50%

Button 1
Button 2
Button 3

Horizontal direction and width 50%

Button 1
Button 2
Button 3

item.title: Social Links WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Social Links WordPress Blockmakes it easy to add social icons in style with your theme and customize their alignment for different devices.

Icons outlined, with background, default

item.title: Person WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Person WordPress Block allows you to implement a stunning team showcase section without a dedicated Gutenberg blocks plugin.

Jane DoeCompany CEO

A chief technology officer and a member of the board of directors

John CollinsArt director

A creative mind behind all design projects and a creative manager

Emily WatsonDesigner

An energetic software developer and the logic mind behind code

item.title: Accordion WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Accordion WordPress Block brings accordion tabs you can use to build FAQ sections and categorize information with Gutenberg blocks. The headings and icons are customizable. You can put any content inside the accordion using other Gutenberg blocks.

can i get free expert advice?

If you already have the concept and design, you can request our free expert consultation and well get back to you within one week. If you need tech advice, you can book a premium one-hour consultation.

We normally provide this service of restoring broken source code repositories. However, since this is the most time-consuming and challenging process, we need to firstly look through your particular problem.

We take care of your ownership rights! You have the right to the app we develop for your business needs. You also own the bespoke design solutions we create according to your mockups and instructions.

item.title: Toggle WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Toggle WordPress Blockadds manually expandable/collapsible toggles allowing you to create more organized FAQ sections. You can create really content-rich toggle tabs by putting any other Gutenberg blocks inside.

item.title: Tabs WordPress Block

item.title: Image Stack Gallery WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Image Stack Gallery WordPress Blockis a unique and simple block that allows you to build impressive image galleries by using seven gallery layout styles.

Default style

Selected style - "Gamma"

Selected style - "Zeta"

item.title: Testimonial WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Testimonial WordPress Block comes with a ready-made layout for featuring admin-created testimonials.

Modern IT skills, the best-in-class designers and overall great people to deal with! We recommend it to every startup. We look up to these experts!

Tom TaylorUnicorn

Im happy with the result! We managed to run a startup app for connecting businesses with medical experts in order to streamline their communication.

Adam SmithCo-founder

item.title: Recent Posts WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Recent Posts WordPress Blockis super handy for adding automatically sourced posts from your blog on any other page. Along with the variety of layouts, it ships with a ton of functionalities you wont find in other Gutenberg plugins.

Grid layout, three columns, H3 heading, post meta hidden

List layout, H2 heading

item.title: Image Slider WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Image Slider WordPress Block offers a simple slider block for WordPress with the ability to modify navigation styles, the size of slides and animation effects.

Single slide

Multiple slides, controls inside, images with captions

Multiple slides, custom height & slideshow

Slides with custom links

item.title: Media & Text Slider WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Media & Text Slider WordPress Block allows you to create slideshows with animated layers and custom sizing.

New Editing Experience
It's a whole new way to use WordPress. Try it now!
Download

item.title: Icon WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Icon WordPress Blockallows you to build user-friendly and simplified interfaces with a set of fully customizable icons.

Default icons

Icons with background & animation

Icons with border & link

item.title: Icon Box WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Icon Box WordPress Blockwill help you add ready-to-go service boxes that may comprise icons, headings and text containers. Youll be able to alter the color scheme, sizing and hover effects.

Custom alignment, custom icon styles.

item.title: Image Box WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Advanced Spacer WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Advanced Spacer WordPress Block will help you create better design consistency by applying spacing of the needed size between blocks. Feel free to set those custom spaces selectively for mobile, tablet or desktop devices.

item.title: Instagram WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Instagram WordPress Blockprovides an easy connection bridge between your Instagram account and WordPress allowing you to embed a stylish live-feed Instagram gallery.

Nine items & three columns, small spacing between items

Five items & five columns, no spacing between items

item.title: Posts Slider WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Post Slider WordPress Blockgives you a tool to display website posts in a slider with the ability to completely customize a slide layout.

Controls inside, slide animation effect, slideshow enabled

Controls outside, fade animation effect

Custom slide template

item.title: Posts Carousel WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Post Carousel WordPress Blockallows you to list or grid posts that are automatically sourced from your site.

Controls outside, three columns, small spacing

Arrows inside, dots hidden, two columns, large spacing, slideshow enabled

item.title: Posts Grid/List WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Custom Post Type WordPress Blockis a one-of-a-kind Gutenberg block for automatically sourced WordPress posts, pages and custom post types that can be showcased in a grid, list or custom view. There is a ton of layout and styles settings to build a custom look.

List layout, with pagination

Grid layout, two columns, without pagination

item.title: Contact Form WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Contact Form WordPress Blockallows you to embed a fully-functional, no-frills contact form in Gutenberg with customizable fields, labels and support for reCAPTCHA.

item.title: Price List WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Price List WordPress Block is a ready-to-go design for restaurant menus and the table of content sections.

Customizable title type, links in title, currency before/after price

item.title: Progress Bar WordPress Blocks
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Linear Progress Bar

Linear Progress Bar WordPress Blockadds an animated horizontal progress bar, wherein you can change colors and values.

HTML

95%

CSS

93%

JS

85%

Design

75%

Circular Progress Bar

Circular Progress Bar WordPress Blockadds animated circular progress bars, wherein you can adjust a bar sickness, size and colors.

item.title: MailChimp WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Mailchimp WordPress Blockis a Gutenberg blocks connection tool that allows you to add a Mailchimp newsletter subscription box to WordPress.

item.title: Countdown WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Countdown WordPress Blockadds a live countdown timer with numeric values and time labels, wherein you can change a default font family, style, sizes, spaces and the color scheme.

Custom background and text colors.

Custom font-family, font size, text color.

item.title: Video Popup WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Video Popup WordPress Blockallows you to upload and display Youtube, Vimeo or self-hosted videos in awesome popups. Feel free to tailor the play video button, add video covers, and modify colors/sizes of the Gutenberg plugin container.

Button styles - with border, outlined, with background, customizable button colors

Getwid WordPress Blocks

Getwid WordPress Blocks

Getwid WordPress Blocks

Applied poster image for video

Getwid WordPress Blocks for Gutenberg

item.title: Content Timeline WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Content Timeline WordPress Block allows you to build a stunning animated timeline graph that features a chronological order of events. You can go deeply into customization by altering headings, subheadings, images and more.

05.12.2018

Video Popup Block

Display your Youtube, Vimeo or self-hosted videos in popups; the play video button, custom video covers, colors and sizes of the block containers are fully adjustable and are fully adjustable.

05.12.2018

05.08.2015

Image Hotspot Block

Place unlimited animated markers with fully customizable tooltips over your image to make it more informative and interactive and more informative and interactive.

05.08.2015

Timeline with set up background color, text color, without images and with left-aligned timeline items.

Phase I

Video Popup Block

Display your Youtube, Vimeo or self-hosted videos in popups; the play video button, custom video covers, colors and sizes of the block containers are fully adjustable.

Phase I

Phase II

Image Hotspot Block

Place unlimited animated markers with fully customizable tooltips over your image to make it more informative and interactive.

Phase II

Phase III

Advanced Table Block

Place unlimited animated markers with fully customizable tooltips over your image to make it more informative and interactive.

Phase III

item.dc:creator: admin

Image Hotspot WordPress Block is a one-of-a-kind block for the Gutenberg library that allows for placing any number of animated markers/tooltips over images to make them more instructive.

Assuming that you will go the easy way and choose a theme for your WordPress website, the overall number of characteristics that you will need to keep in mind narrows down significantly. item.title: Table of Contents WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Table of Contents WordPress Block will help you create a table of contents with quick links to any part of a page where headings are used. Ordered and unordered lists are available.

  1. Chapter Name 1
    1. Subchapter Name 1
  2. Chapter Name 2
    1. Subchapter Name 1
      1. Additional Subchapter Name 1
      2. Additional Subchapter Name 2
    2. Subchapter Name 2
  3. Chapter Name 3

item.title: Advanced Table WordPress Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Advanced Table WordPress Block makes it easy to add tables of various complexity in Gutenberg. You can merge cells, customize borders, colors, spacing, and more.
